title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
Introducing the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, the perfect companion for all your needs! This backpack is designed with the utmost consideration for our elderly folks, ensuring ease of use and accessibility.

With its spacious design, this backpack can accommodate laptops of various sizes, from 17.3 to 13.3 inches, ensuring compatibility with your device. The insulated cooler compartment, measuring 11.4 x 5.5 x 6.9 inches, can hold up to 10 cans and features water-resistant aluminum and high-quality lining material. It keeps your food warm and your drinks cold for an impressive 3-5 hours, and it conveniently folds when not in use.

You'll find multiple pockets throughout this backpack, including a roomy main zipper pocket for clothes, files, papers, and more. There are also two small front pockets and two side pockets for your umbrella or facial tissue. Internal organizers, such as slots and a key hook, keep your belongings organized and easily accessible.

For your convenience, this backpack features a USB port and includes a charging cable, making it easy to charge your devices on the go. A power bank is required for this function. The backpack is also TSA-approved and unfolds at a 90-180 degree angle for hassle-free security checks. It even comes with a luggage strap, allowing you to attach it to your suitcase for effortless travel.

Comfort is a top priority with padded shoulder straps, mesh back pads, and a padded handle. You can carry this backpack with ease and comfort, no matter the load. Safety is also paramount, with an anti-theft pocket for your passports, wallets, and ID cards, as well as a sturdy luggage strap.

Made from high-density polyester fabric, this backpack is highly durable and resistant to rips and scratches. It is also water-resistant, ensuring your belongings stay dry in any weather condition. Suitable for various purposes, including as a teacher, business, picnic, or travel backpack, this versatile bag is perfect for any occasion.

Not only is this backpack practical, but it also makes a great gift idea for Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year celebrations. Treat yourself or your loved ones to the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, the ultimate companion for your everyday adventures.
